SEARCH
Package us.ullberg.startpunkt.objects.kubernetes

Class BaseKubernetesObject

java.lang.Object
us.ullberg.startpunkt.objects.kubernetes.BaseKubernetesObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
KubernetesObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnnotatedKubernetesObject, HajimariApplicationWrapper, StartpunktApplicationWrapper
public abstract class BaseKubernetesObject extends Object implements KubernetesObject
Abstract base class representing a Kubernetes custom resource wrapper. Provides common functionality to retrieve application specifications and metadata from Kubernetes generic resources.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs the wrapper with the specified API group, version, and plural kind.

    • getGenericKubernetesResources

      protected io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.GenericKubernetesResourceList getGenericKubernetesResources(io.fabric8.kubernetes.client.KubernetesClient client, boolean anyNamespace, List<String> matchNames)
      Retrieves a list of generic Kubernetes resources of this type, filtered by namespaces.
      Parameters:
      client - the Kubernetes client instance
      anyNamespace - if true, searches across all namespaces; otherwise uses matchNames
      matchNames - list of namespace names to filter on (used only if anyNamespace is false)
      Returns:
      list of GenericKubernetesResource objects

    • getApplicationSpecs

      public List<ApplicationSpec> getApplicationSpecs(io.fabric8.kubernetes.client.KubernetesClient client, boolean anyNamespace, List<String> matchNames)
      Retrieves application specifications by mapping Kubernetes generic resources.
      Specified by:
      getApplicationSpecs in interface KubernetesObject
      Parameters:
      client - the Kubernetes client instance
      anyNamespace - whether to search across all namespaces
      matchNames - list of namespaces to filter on if anyNamespace is false
      Returns:
      list of ApplicationSpec instances

    • getAppTags

      protected String getAppTags(io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.GenericKubernetesResource item)
      Returns the tags of the application. By default, reads from the "startpunkt.ullberg.us/tags" annotation.
      Parameters:
      item - the Kubernetes generic resource
      Returns:
      comma-separated tags string or null if not set

    • getOptionalSpecString

      protected String getOptionalSpecString(io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.GenericKubernetesResource item, String key, String fallback)

      Parameters:

      key - the key to lookup in the spec
      fallback - fallback value if key is absent
      Returns:
      value from spec or fallback

      Retrieves the application root path from resource annotations.

      Returns:

    • appendRootPath

      protected String appendRootPath(String url, io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.GenericKubernetesResource item)
      Appends the root path to the URL if a rootPath annotation is present.
      Parameters:
      url - base URL
      item - Kubernetes resource to get rootPath from
      Returns:
      URL with rootPath appended or original URL if no rootPath

    • appendRootPath

      protected String appendRootPath(String url, String rootPath)
      Appends the root path to the URL.
      Parameters:
      url - base URL
      rootPath - root path to append
      Returns:
      URL with rootPath appended
